example.name: ignore an NP
example.text: Susan Del Signore, head trader at Travelers Investment Management Co., says critics are ignoring ``the role the (takeover stock) speculator is taking in the market as a source of volatility.''
example.arg: the role the (takeover stock) speculator is taking in the market

example.name: ignore an S
example.text: [Some people]-1 tend *trace*-1 to ignore that a 50-point move is less in percentage terms than it was when the stock market was lower.
example.arg: that a 50-point move is less in percentage terms than it was when the stock market was lower

predicate.note: Frames file for 'ignore' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. No comparison.
